p: Changes in mortality in the scenarios are only given in absolute terms and not divided by age group. In order to obtain the productive years until the age of retirement and monetize them with the average gross median income, we transfer the current distribution of deaths across age groups for Austria from the Global Burden of Disease Study 2015 [ 40] to the changes in mortality in the scenarios. Previously lost productive years due to morbidity that can be regained in the scenarios lead to cost savings. In the underlying study, benefits from reduced productivity losses are considered.
